msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US District Court Western Division of Washington, Seattle

div1.p: United States District Court Western Division of Washington, Northern Division.
In the Matter of the Application of Ching Hing for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
No. Cross-Interrogatories to be Propounded to Corry M. Stadden.
1. Were you present all the time that the appeal in the Ching Hing case was being considered in the office of the Secretary of Labor?
2. How would it be possible for you to tell who decided this case?

p.add: Recieved copy of herein sets of interrogatories and it is argued that they be and returned at same time as origianl interrogatories forwarded with commission John J Sullivan Atty for Pet.
